MUST_BE_VALID_EMAIL: Must be a valid email address
PASSWORD_MUST_CONTAIN: Password must be seven characters long and contain both letters and numbers
VERIFY_EMAIL_ADDRESS: You Need to Verify Your Email Address
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: You have not yet verified your email address. Click the button below to send a verification email.
EMAIL_VERIFIED: Congratulations! Your email address has been verified. No further action required on this page.
EMAIL_VERIFYING: Attempting to verify your email address...
USER_NOT_LOGGED_IN: We can't find the user data; make sure you're logged in.
CANNOTE_CREATE_ACCOUNT_WHILE_LOGGED_IN: You are currently logged in. You cannot create a new account while you are logged in.
ANNOTATION_ALERT: Earn more annotation credits by annotating more videos
AVERAGE_RATING_OF_ANNOTATIONS: Average rating of total annotations recorded
GIVE_DEVELOPERS_FEEDBACK_ABOUT_THE_APP: Give the developers feedback about the app.
URL_LINK_TO_ISSUE: URL link to the page containing the issue
STEPS_TO_REPRODUCE_MUST_BE_INCLUDED: Steps to reproduce any issue must be included
TOTAL_NET_POINTS_EARNED_THIS_MONTH: Total net points earned this month
